text: Kim Jin-pyo (; born 4 May 1947) is a South Korean politician who was the Speaker of the National Assembly from 2022 to 2024. He was a government minister under two liberal Presidents Kim Dae-jung and Roh Moo-hyun. He has represented Suwon at the National Assembly since 2004. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the National Assembly (South Korea)
title: Kim Jin-pyo (politician)
